product_name: Grivel Beta Easy Quickdraw Set - Package of 5
long_description: Don't waste precious strength trying to clip a bolt. The Grivel Beta Easy Quickdraw set has a semirigid sling cover that makes clipping fast and simple. Straight-gate carabiner on top has a keylock nose that won't snag on bolt hangers, pitons or webbing. Clip the rope into the lightweight wiregate carabiner on the bottom. 11cm Dyneema sling is light and strong; sling cover gives the quickdraw just the right amount of rigidity to make clipping easy and fast. Cover also protects the sling from abrasion and keeps the carabiners properly oriented. Package includes 5 Grivel Beta Easy quickdraws.
short_description: Don't waste precious strength trying to clip a bolt. The Grivel Beta Easy Quickdraw set has a semirigid sling cover that makes clipping fast and simple.
